text: [Applause]

sup player this week we In Living Color
with The Giver by Lois
Lowry 11year old Thug Joan is coming up
in a trap that at first seemed pretty
legit unlike the Crooked outside world
or elsewhere This Hood ain't got no War
disease hunger or poverty truth is
though the only reason Peep's keeping it
so chill is cuz everybody sipping on the
philosophy of sameness which basically
means two things everybody living like a
bunch of lame ass drones to keep
peaceful and a crew of old geers calling
all the shots who hooks up with who how
many babies a bitty can pop out they
even making you pop pills at killer
Brothers
Mojo and when you too old to hack it
anymore you get release we'll get to
that later now that Jonas is finally old
enough to count the hair on his nuts
them old folks give him the special job
of receiver of memories cuz unlike
everybody else in the streets Jonah's
got the capacity to see beyond see back
when the hood decided to St preaching
that samess jive the M Thomas took all
the world's memories and dumped them in
the mind of just one G the receiver and
now the old receiver going to get up on
his giv grind and pull the memories out
of his Dome into Jonas as the give a
packing the memories into Jonas's
backside Jonas be learning about all
sorts of crazy he ain't never known
about the sun snow love and even War by
the time that Jonas gets a little taste
of what to give or dealing Jay dog
realized that the memories of the world
fill with way too much pain and not even
the hardest Hustler can handle him solo
without odan Jonas asked the giver why
can't we all share this pain yo like the
L know I mean if we cut it up and share
with all the hood we can get this on
lock but the give like ain't happening
yo regular homies don't want pain they
just want to keep things as chill as
possible but Jonas ain't buying that
mess then one day Jonas learned that
getting released is really just getting
wasted by the man and his little baby
buddy Gabriel is next on The Hit List so
he say man fck this I'm out since
memories last forever Jonas is going to
get what he really wants cuz once he
pieces out of town everyone's going to
have to take a hit of them painful
memories even though he want the giver
to come the G man like nah bro I got to
hold it down and make sure nobody loses
their [ __ ] when they experience pain and
loneliness for the first time so Jonas
grabs baby Gabe and rolls out to the
outside world with things be all sorts
of nasty but he got to nut up and Beast
through it all to keep him and Gabe
alive when the book end Jonas and Gabe
cruising on a sled towards some bright
lights in the window and uh that's about
it what the
hell first thing you guys should know is
that when the author was a little Thug
at she was kicking it with some peeps
crazy about keeping everybody in line a
lot of Scholars thinking made old Lo
want to spit some raw truth about what
it was like living in a spot where
somebody's riding your nuts 24/7 having
somebody bust your ass till it's raw is
going to do you just like Jonas's boy
Ash got did when he wasn't talking right
the next morning he had done it again
and again the following week he couldn't
seem to stop though for each lapse the
discipline wand came again escalating to
a series of painful lashes that left
marks on Asher's legs eventually for a
period of time Asher stopped talking all
together in the world where the law gets
all up in your sh every time you bone up
it's sometimes better to just throw up
the deuce to all them haters but at the
beginning of the book Lowry making it
seem like Jonas's hood is the place to
be for example it seems like Jonas's
Daddy's a super righteous dude since he
got an ideal family and all he do is
take care of babies all day Fool's job
title is even nurturer but on the real
there be some shady going down under the
surface when the giv show Jonas a video
of his daddy on the grind he realize
that pops ain't just about nursing
babies he also kills the ones that ain't
up to Snuff uhuh when Jonas realized how
backwards things in his hood be he tried
to use them memories to open up everyone
else's eyes but ain't none of his homies
can f him on that like my boy yvon said
in Soulja neon's one day in the life of
Ivon denisovich how can you expect a man
who's warm to understand a man who's
cold so on the way Jonah's just like
that biblical gangster Jonah who was
sent by the Big G man to tell the
Crooked cats and Nineveh that they best
change their ways and likewise Jonah's
got to spread that pain and feeling even
though them Duds and the hood don't want
him to look homies always saying
ignorance is bliss but is it well the
truth hurts that's for damn sure but on
the real a player can't experience life
without experiencing pain know what I
mean if he had stayed he would have
starved in other ways he would have
lived a life hungry for feelings for
color and for love and on the same note
how you going to know life without
subscribing man catch me next time
player

peace
